description: List action item team members with filtering and pagination
permissions: Allowed for users who can access the related action items under ActionItemTeamMemberPolicy scope (delegated to ActionItem policy scope), including admins and users with qualifying memberships or who are team members on the action item.
validation_notes: Filter is-responsible-person must be a strict boolean (true/false).

flags.name: --action-item
flags.description: Filter by action item ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of action item IDs.

flags.name: --user
flags.description: Filter by user ID (comma-separated for multiple)
